headline: Caldera Releases Expanded Features for Direct-to-Film and Direct-to-Garment Digital Textile Printing
summary: Caldera, part of Dover (NYSE: DOV), today announced the launch of its latest raster image processor ("RIP") solution for Direct-to-Film (DTF) and Direct-to-Garment (DTG) digital textile printing. This new solution offers an expanded range of features for printed apparel creators, printers and producers and is compatible with Windows and MacOS.
